item.description:
Arrive at 10:00 and launch by 10:30 AM

Organizers: Mark Roberts, mroberts@CIA.com 401-533-1883 cell

Check RICKA Message Board for last minute cancellations: http://members.boardh...

Weâ€™ll explore this section of the Blackstone fully. It is quite beautiful with several hidden ponds. The river itself is about 4 miles roundtrip with two more miles for the hidden ponds.

Bring a lunch.

Directions: Central Falls Landing - For Mapquest/GPS, use 45 Madeira Avenue
From Route 146, turn onto Route 123 east to Valley Falls, take right onto Broad Street, right onto Madeira Avenue
and a right into the parking lot.

Check RICKA for additional paddles scheduled
RICKA Schedule:
http://www.ricka-flat...

RICKA Blackstone Paddlers has additional free instruction and beginner paddles
Blackstone Valley Paddlers
http://www.ricka-flat...
item.how_to_find_us: Orange/Yellow Riot Voyager Kayak, shaved head
item.name: Blackstone River, Central Falls RI
